name: Slime Hunt (Game Jam WIP)
description:
A WIP for game testing purposes. What I am working on for the GameDev.TV Game Jam 2022 submission

Controls 

Move: WASD or Left Stick

Dash: Spacebar or Left Bumper

Attack: L, Left Mouse Button, or "west" button

Action: e or "south" button

Pause: p or "Pause" button

Inventory: i or "north" button

*inventory button is bugged for some odd reason :(
